name: cloudflared
description: Cloudflared is a command-line client used to connect your private services securely to Cloudflare's network using tunnels. It enables exposing local apps, SSH, and RDP without exposing ports publicly.
features: Cloudflare Tunnels: Securely expose local services to internet. No port forwarding.
Zero Trust Access: Connect services without public IP exposure. Enhanced security.
SSH & RDP: Tunnel SSH and RDP connections securely. Protected access.
Local Apps: Expose local applications safely. Development friendly.
Command-Line: Powerful CLI for tunnel management. Developer tool.
Cross-Platform: Works on Linux, Windows, and macOS. Universal compatibility.
Cloudflare Network: Leverage Cloudflare's global network. Fast and reliable.
